name: Flying Panther - Gangster City Survival Shooter
name_original: Flying Panther - Gangster City Survival Shooter
description:
In a world of superheroes, the Fly Panther is the one that is helping this city. The city is infested with low lifes bent upon ruining this once calm and peaceful metropolitan city.

The city is run amok with violence, crime, accidents and hazards. You are the one now responsible to clear this city from its infestation.

Fight your own battles using your hands, guns and super powers.

Be ready for real superhero fighting and shooting game! This game unlike others is full of thrill, action and adventure. The incredible hero takes you on next level. Become a metropolis city superhero and fly around for saving people lives.

Wear your Super Suit and go fight crime and save the city!

You are the only HOPE!
